indicator_name: Resources from the municipal Global Justice programme allocated to the institutional training of local authorities and civil society for the implementation of the SDGs
graph_title: Resources from the municipal Global Justice programme allocated to the institutional training of local authorities and civil society for the implementation of the SDGs
barcelona_target: Develop international cooperation with regard to training and institutional improvement for the introduction of the SDGs
national_indicator_available: Resources from the municipal Global Justice programme allocated to the institutional training of local authorities and civil society for the implementation of the SDGs
target_line_2030: Maintain the budgetary effort for institutional training, increasing the coordination of projects with local authorities in order to generate instruments that create synergies for achieving the SDGs
target_name: Increase international support for the efficient implementation of training programmes, with specific objectives, for developing countries, in order to provide support for their national plans geared towards applying all the Sustainable Development Goals, by means of North-South, South-South and triangular cooperation, among others
